settings.heading: 10% Off Your First Purchase
settings.paragraph: Take 10% off your first order when signing up to our email newsletter. Discount codes are valid for new email subscribers & on first purchase only. Offer not valid on gift cards, shipping, or tax. Offer cannot be combined with any other promotional offer or added to an existing purchase after it has been placed.

settings.heading: Sign Up for SMS & Get 10% Off
settings.paragraph: Get an additional 10% off your next order when signing up to receive SMS alerts. Offer not valid on gift cards, shipping, or tax. Offer cannot be combined with any other promotional offer or added to an existing purchase after it has been placed.

settings.heading: Subscribe & Save 10%
settings.paragraph: Subscribe to eligible products and get 10% off every order, plus free shipping on recurring orders, early access to new products, and exclusive access to deluxe samples.

settings.heading: Earn 10% OSEA Store Credit
settings.paragraph: Get 10% back on all U.S. orders when you pay with your preferred bank account using Catch. Plus, get a $10 bonus credit to use after your first order.

settings.heading: Give $20, Get $20
settings.paragraph: Give your friends $20 off on their first order of $80+ and get $20 off your next order of $80+ for each successful referral.

settings.heading: Free Standard Shipping on Orders $50+
settings.paragraph: Free Standard Shipping on orders over $50. Flat Rate Shipping is $7.95 on all orders $0-$49.99. These rates are not applicable for orders shipped outside of the US. Taxes and Gift Cards do not count toward the Free Shipping total.

settings.container_classes: grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 gap-6 lg:grid-cols-3 tracking-wide

settings.paragraph_text: From 11/22/22, until 11:59 PM PT on 11/28/22, eligible customers will receive a free Hyaluronic Sea Serum (1 oz) with purchase of $135 or more and a free Undaria Algae Body Butter (6.7 oz) with purchase of $250 or more (less applicable taxes, shipping and handling). Prices are marked on oseamalibu.com. Offer is available on oseamalibu.com. Offer is not valid on previous purchases. No additional discount may be taken at checkout, quantities are limited. If an item goes out of stock during the promotion period, it cannot be purchased at the promotional price when it comes back in stock after the promotion period has ended. Once an order is submitted, we are not able to make any adjustments or cancellations to the order. Exceptions will not be granted. Offer not transferable or redeemable for cash. We reserve the right to modify or replace any part of these Terms and Conditions and terminate this offer at any time without notice. Offer subject to change in OSEA Malibu’s sole discretion. Existing subscription orders do not qualify for this promotion.

settings.heading_text: The OSEA November 23rd Promotion Official Rules (“Official Rules”)

settings.paragraph_text:
NO PURCHASE IS NECESSARY TO ENTER OR WIN.

1. PROMOTION DESCRIPTION: The OSEA November 23rd Promotion (the “Promotion”) consists of two (2) grand prizes, as set forth in greater detail herein, selected via entry through Instagram. The entry period is valid from November 23, 2022 at 1:00pm PST through 11:59pm PST on November 24, 2022 (the “Entry Period”). To enter, a person (hereinafter, “you” or the “Entrant”) must (i) follow the official @OSEAMalibu channel on Instagram, (ii) provide a comment in the comment section on the official @OSEAMalibu Instagram post relating to the Promotion, and (iii) tag a friend on Instagram in such comments section. Thereafter, OSEA shall select two winners to receive a prize (the original Entrant and the friend tagged by the Entrant), as set forth in greater detail below, selected from Entrants. Each individual winner shall hereinafter be referred to as a “Winner”, and collectively, the “Winners”. By participating in the Promotion, each Entrant unconditionally accepts and agrees to comply with and abide by these Official Rules and the decisions of OSEA International, LLC, with an official address at 1795 Washington Way, Venice, CA 90291 (“OSEA”), which shall be final and binding in all respects.

2. ELIGIBILITY: Only legal U.S. residents of the fifty (50) United States, and District of Columbia, who are at least eighteen (18) years of age or older at the time of entry are eligible to enter and must not be employees, or immediate family members of employees, of OSEA. The Promotion is subject to all applicable federal, state, and local laws and regulations. Void where prohibited.

3. HOW TO ENTER: To enter, an Entrant must (i) follow the official @OSEAMalibu channel on Instagram, (ii) provide a comment in the comments section on the official @OSEAMalibu Instagram post relating to the Promotion, and (iii) tag a friend on Instagram in such comments section.

4. WINNER SELECTION AND NOTIFICATION: The winner selection period of the Promotion shall commence on or around 12:00pm PST on November 25, 2022, via the random selection process managed by OSEA (collectively, the “Selection Period”). OSEA thereafter direct message each respective Winner, dependent on what information OSEA has available, informing the Entrant that he or she has won the Prize and instructing the potential winner to follow instructions on how to claim the prize, as applicable. Time is of the essence in awarding a Prize. If, despite reasonable efforts, a potential winner does not respond within twenty-four (24) hours of the first notification attempt, or if the notification is returned as unclaimed or undeliverable to such potential winner, such potential winner may forfeit his or her prize and an alternate Winner may be selected. If any potential winner is found to be ineligible, or if he or she has not complied with these Official Rules or declines a prize for any reason prior to award, such potential winner will be disqualified and an alternate Winner may be selected.

5. PRIZES: Each Winner will receive the following: One Hundred US Dollar (USD $100.00) OSEA gift card for use solely on https://oseamalibu.com constituting a total grand prize package with a retail value of $100.00 for each Winner (collectively, the “Prize”). For clarity, one individual Winners will be selected and awarded from Entrants from Instagram but with two Winners (the original Entrant and the friend tagged by such Entrant).

6. GENERAL PRIZE CONDITIONS: The Prizes will be awarded only if the potential prize winner(s) fully complies with these Official Rules. All portions of the prize(s) are non-assignable and non-transferable. All details and other restrictions of the prize(s) not specified in these Official Rules will be determined by OSEA in its sole discretion. No cash alternative or substitution of the Prize will be allowed.

The Winners shall be responsible for all federal, state, local and income taxes (if any) associated with winning prizes. The Winners may be required to furnish his/her social security number for the sole purpose of preparation of any tax forms as required by law. Except where prohibited by law, entry and acceptance of prize constitute permission to use winner's name and hometown, for purposes of advertising, promotion and publicity (including online posting) in any and all media now or hereafter known throughout the world in perpetuity, without additional compensation, notification or permission by OSEA.

The Prizes set forth herein is awarded “as is” with no warranty or guarantee, either express or implied by OSEA. Winners acknowledges that OSEA does not make, nor are in any manner responsible for any warranty, representations, expressed or implied, in fact or in law, relative to the quality, conditions, fitness or merchantability of any aspect of the prizes being offered, except that each merchandise prize shall be subject to each respective parties typical standard warranty (if any).

7. ODDS. The odds of winning depend on the number of eligible entries received.

8. LIMITATION OF LIABILITY. By entering, Entrant agrees to release and hold harmless OSEA, and each of their respective subsidiaries, affiliates, advertising and promotion agencies, partners, representatives, agents, successors, assigns, employees, officers, and directors from any liability, illness, injury, death, loss, litigation, claim, or damage that may occur, directly or indirectly, whether caused by negligence or not, from: (i) such entrant’s participation in the Promotion and/or his/her acceptance, possession, use, or misuse of any prize or any portion thereof; (ii) technical failures of any kind, including but not limited to the malfunction of any computer, cable, network, hardware, or software, or other mechanical equipment; (iii) the unavailability or inaccessibility of any transmissions, telephone, or Internet service; (iv) unauthorized human intervention in any part of the entry process or the Promotion; (v) electronic or human error in the administration of the Promotion or the processing of entries.

9. DISPUTES: THIS PROMOTION IS GOVERNED BY THE LAWS OF THE US AND THE STATE OF CALIFORNIA WITHOUT RESPECT TO CONFLICT OF LAW DOCTRINES. As a condition of participating in this Promotion, Entrant agrees that any and all disputes that cannot be resolved between the parties, and causes of action arising out of or connected with this Promotion, shall be resolved individually, without resort to any form of class action, exclusively before a court located in Los Angeles, California, having jurisdiction. Further, in any such dispute, under no circumstances shall participant be permitted to obtain awards for, and hereby waives all rights to, punitive, incidental, or consequential damages, including reasonable attorney’s fees, other than participant’s actual out-of-pocket expenses (i.e. costs associated with entering this Promotion). Entrant further waives all rights to have damages multiplied or increased.

10. PRIVACY POLICY. Any personal information submitted with an entry is subject to the Privacy Policy stated on the OSEA website. To read the OSEA Privacy Policy, click here.

11. NO RELATIONSHIP. The Promotion is hosted and managed by OSEA and is in no way sponsored, endorsed, administered by, or associated with Instagram and/or Facebook. You are providing your information to OSEA and not to Instagram and/or Facebook.

settings.heading_text: Free Standard Shipping on All Domestic Orders

settings.paragraph_text: Free standard shipping valid on all orders in the contiguous United States only. Offer valid on 11/11/22.
